channel.description:
Website: http://sirus-scape667.webs.com/ Download link: http://up.ht/16C9p2f
[b]HOME![/b] [img]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/9673/x8m.png[/img]
[b]CORP :D[/b] [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/9435/w17w.png[/img]
[b]All prayers with correct drainage![/b] [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/6449/7h2.png[/img]
[b]Dungeoneering! WITH ALL FLOORRSS ADDED![/b] [img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4899/3qdf.png[/img]
[b]ALL ITEMS ARE WORKING AND EXCHANGEABLE[/b] [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/6073/m27e.png[/img]
[b]ALL SKILLS ;)[/b] [img]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/9553/52ry.png[/img]
[b]Bossing like always flawless (:[/b] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/3482/ofsl.png[/img]
[b]PLAYER PANEL[/b] [img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/580/7oe5.png[/img]
[b]EVERYTHING (:[/b] [img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/7250/sxfp.png[/img]
[center]Why should you join SiriusX?
No lag. Dedicated server with 1 Gbps internet connection. Very stable server. Daily Updates. Decent drop rates. Double Drop Weekends. Donator zone for the awesome donators :) Owner listens to your suggestions. Auto donation, get your item instantly.
Features: Pyramid Plunder Dominion Tower Gilded Altar Castle Wars Squeal of Fortune Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Recipe for Diaster Boss fight (Instanced map just like runescape) Glacors with fire spell weekness. Fairy Ring (Code for Glacors is DKQ) Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. Loyalty Shop Kuradals Dungeon FightCaves/Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon Barrows Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Kalphite Queen Bork Tormented Demons Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin[/center]
[center][size=36pt]NEED PLAYERS AND STAFF![/size][/center]

item.title: SirusScape 667! Join today ! need staff ! and players ! Please no hate
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

If anything my comment should be indicative of someone who would not play your server because you have a poorly made advertisement. It’s nothing personal, I just feel like the work you put into this advertisement (being very little) could reflect within your server. Just being realistic. My opinion as an outsider should actually matter to you, especially if it could shed some light on your situation to make your server better. Regardless, good luck.

Read full topic
